channel.title: Nets8's Typing Services
channel.description:
Do you need something typed? Like an essay? Anything? I will type what you need for a cheap fee and it will be without any typos, following all of your exact guidelines.
If you want to make a deal, add my MSN at [removed]
The way this works is you scan your paper(s) with a scanner, and send me the picture(s) through email. Also, you can send me the paper(s) through main. You will then pay me the designated fee, and I will start working on it. I will type as long as needed, so you can send me longer papers too, just means a higher fee. I accept Paypal and through the mail, but I will not send you the typed paper(s) until I receive the money (through Paypal OR the mail). If you charge back, I will report you to Paypal and you will get in serious trouble. Why? Because this isn't gold selling, this is perfectly legal and fool-proof. I will take screen shots and other necessary things.
Any questions? Ask away.
[b]PS:[/b] [i]Your privacy is valued to me. If you don't want to be taken screen shots of for security reasons, then you don't have to order. If you don't want to, I won't make a deal with you for security reasons.[/i] [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnpmod.gif[/img] We do not sell anything on this website (the exception to this rule being SCAR scripts, if you're approved to sell them).[/center]

item.title: Nets8's Typing Services
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

So, because it’s legal you can advertise here?

Read full topic

Do you need something typed? Like an essay? Anything? I will type what you need for a cheap fee and it will be without any typos, following all of your exact guidelines.
